Title: Mega Quiz
Description: The Mega Quiz is an exciting and intellectually stimulating competition designed to test participants' knowledge across various domains. This activity combines education and entertainment, fostering healthy competition among participants.

Title: CAD War
Description: The primary objective of a CAD event is to showcase and celebrate the creativity, skills, and innovation of participants in utilizing CAD software to design and visualize concepts.

Title: Town Planning
Description: Engage in urban development challenges in Town Planning. Participants can formulate strategic plans for optimizing land use, infrastructure, and community amenities. Address aspects of urban planning, including transportation, housing, green spaces, and commercial areas.

Title: Bridge Building Competition
Description: Design and construct a bridge using only specific materials provided by Team CESA. Test the strength and durability of your bridge by applying various loads. Compete to see which bridge can hold the most weight without collapsing.

Title: Gear Based Puzzle
Description: Challenge yourself to design and build gear mechanisms that achieve specific objectives, such as speed reduction, torque multiplication, and complex motion. Compete with other participants to build the most efficient mechanism.

Title: Chem Crafter Challenge
Description: The Chem Crafter Challenge is a two-round event testing conceptual knowledge, creativity, and problem-solving abilities in chemistry. It combines Chemical Pictionary and Molecule Model Building.

Title: Quiz
Description: Step into the thrilling world of cybersecurity with CyberSecure Challenge, a three-round competition testing knowledge, quick thinking, and problem-solving skills in digital security.

Title: Astro Quest
Description: Astro Quest features debates and quizzes focused on the fascinating subject of space exploration and astronomy.

Title: Chess Competition
Description: Showcase your strategic skills in an exciting chess tournament open to all skill levels.
Venue_Location: Gym/Open space above Ten Bhagyanagar/Papa’s Café

Title: Coding Competition
Description: Participate in a coding competition designed to test your programming skills across various languages and platforms.

Title: Tech Antakshari
Description: Tech Antakshari is a fun and interactive event blending technology trivia with the classic Antakshari format.

Title: Component Hunt
Description: Scour the campus for hidden components and complete technical challenges in this thrilling scavenger hunt.

Title: Meme Malware
Description: Compete by designing memes that creatively explain technical cybersecurity concepts and issues.

Title: Advertisement/Virtual Poster for Sponsors
Description: Design virtual posters and advertisements to attract sponsorship and promote the event.
